cmp: 合 (one-tenth of a peck, Chinese musical note/fit/to join)
mng: to pick up, to collate or arrange, ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

to ascend in light steps

to pocket a lost article, (fig.) to correct others' errors, to remedy omissions (in a text etc)

to put in order, to tidy up, to pack, to repair, (coll.) to sort sb out, to fix sb

to clear up, to tidy up, to pick up
to go up or down stairs step by step
